Header.Content: Prevent token rings auto applying to certain files paths (such as tokenizer or JB2A files). Type the filepath to a folder in the text box and click the plus, or use the file browser to select a folder. Click the x on the tags to remove items from the blacklist.
Header.Title: Blacklist

Warning.EmptyInput: Please type a file path into the text box.

App.WindowTitle: Put A Ring On It - Blacklist Menu

Menu.Hint: Prevent token rings auto applying to certain files paths (such as tokenizer or JB2A files).
Menu.Label: Blacklist
Menu.Name: Blacklist Menu

Menu.Hint: Customize token ring "Profiles" which are presets that can quickly applied to tokens.
Menu.Label: Profiles
Menu.Name: Profiles Menu

ApplyByDisposition.Hint: Apply based on a token's disposition.
ApplyByDisposition.Name: Apply by Disposition

ApplyByLinkedStatus.Hint: Apply to tokens based on "Link Actor Data" status.
ApplyByLinkedStatus.Name: Apply by Linked Status

AutoApply.Hint: Automatically apply token ring to relevant tokens when dropped on the scene. When disabled, token rings must be enabled on the prototype token.
AutoApply.Name: Auto Apply Token Ring

DefaultProfileFriendly.Hint: Token Ring Profile that will be applied to Friendly tokens without a customized ring.
DefaultProfileFriendly.Name: Default Friendly Token Ring Profile

DefaultProfileHostile.Hint: Token Ring Profile that will be applied to Hostile tokens without a customized ring.
DefaultProfileHostile.Name: Default Hostile Token Ring Profile

DefaultProfileNeutral.Hint: Token Ring Profile that will be applied to Neutral tokens without a customized ring.
DefaultProfileNeutral.Name: Default Neutral Token Ring Profile
